stories.Title: JUICE mission just launched!
stories.Description: ESA's Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer mission, which will explore three of Jupiter's largest moons in 2031, has finally launched today after delays caused by bad weather.

stories.Title: SpaceX approaches its seventh rideshare mission
stories.Description: The Falcon 9 rocket is ready to launch on April 15th with over 50 payloads, after unfavorable weather delayed the launch.

stories.Title: Tesla’s Model 3 gets a refresh
stories.Description: Users on Reddit are currently buzzing about a leaked photo that suggests a possible update to Tesla's Model 3, with the sedan finally receiving its long-awaited redesign.

stories.Title: Apple's future wearables
stories.Description: Insiders claim that the upcoming AR/VR headset could work independently without an iPhone or iPad, and it might be unveiled at this year's Worldwide Developers Conference.

stories.Title: FAIR team at Meta AI announces Animated Drawings
stories.Description: As a result of this revolutionary open-source initiative, animating your drawings is now easier and more accessible than ever before.

stories.Title: A startup founded by three brothers has big space ambitions
stories.Description: Argo Space Corporation, founded by former SpaceX employees, aims to create a transportation network of reusable spacecraft powered by water harvested from the moon.

stories.Title: Stability AI releases Stable Diffusion XL
stories.Description: With the launch of this new text-to-image AI system,  the startup seeks to enhance the "richness" of image generation and improve upon its previous model.

stories.Title: Microsoft’s Bing chatbot is now available on iOS
stories.Description: By adding the AI-powered chatbot to its SwiftKey keyboard app, Microsoft is aiming to overtake competitors such as Google and Apple in the AI race.

stories.Title: Adobe's video software will include AI-powered editing tools
stories.Description: The company plans to enhance post-production efficiency for video editors by integrating AI technology into their Premiere Pro and After Effects software.

stories.Title: Museum offers $25,000 reward for meteorite
stories.Description: The first person to retrieve at least one kilogram of a fireball that fell over Maine (US) in April will be rewarded by a geology museum in the state.

stories.Title: Write all you want with 10,000-character tweets
stories.Description: Apparently, in an effort to compete with Substack, Twitter has announced a new feature for Blue subscribers that allows them to post tweets up to 10,000 characters long.

title: Tesla Model 3 gets redesigned, Swiftkey brings chatGPT to iOS, Stability AI's new model
